title: garden font?
content:
hi i know this is a common face but i can’t find it on my system for the life of me. could anyone help me out please???

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024000im_/http:/typophile.com/files/70e7493981d13b85a9f44b50829d0a30_5151.png)

 [‹ New 90210 Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024000/http:/typophile.com/node/48327 "Go to previous forum topic") [Suggestions for a similar blackletter? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024000/http:/typophile.com/node/48318 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simundo

comments.content:
It’s [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024000/http:/www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm).  
How common is Bliss?  
I don’t know.
thank you indeed jan! spot on! I was mistaken for a different typeface no wonder i had no chance of finding it. Never come across bliss before, its really nice.
